sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, createContext } from 'react' export const Biodata = createContext(); const AddNewDivision = ({ setInfo, setToggle, toggle }) => { const [data, setData] = useState({ divisionName: "", incharge: "", email: "", totalEmployee: "", }); const [record, setRecord] = useState([]); const handleChange = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setData(data => ({ ...data, [name]: value })) } const handleSubmit = () => { const newrecord = { ...data, id: new Date().getTime().toString() } setRecord([...record, newrecord]) setInfo(record) setData({ divisionName: "", incharge: "", email: "", totalEmployee: "", }) setTimeout(() => { setToggle(!toggle) }, 1600); } return ( <>
Add New Division

Division Name

Incharge

Incharge E-mail ID

Total Employees Working

 ) } export default AddNewDivision //export { Biodata };
